item.title: Compositional Generalization Across Distributional Shifts with Sparse Tree Operations
item.description: Sparse Differentiable Tree Machine (sDTM) improves compositional generalization in neural networks by efficiently representing tree structures in vector space, enabling simultaneous symbolic and neura…
